branding.description: A compassionate research platform dedicated to personal health documentation, with advanced support for neurological health tracking and patient-driven medical insights.

story.headline: My Research Journey:
story.content: From misdiagnosis with FND to discovering DiGeorge syndrome through AI analysis, my personal health challenges became the foundation for developing ethical AI frameworks.
story.mission: Living with memory challenges from neurological conditions gives me unique insight into designing AI systems that truly understand and support diverse cognitive needs.
